lines.content: ‚ÄúYour mind is for having ideas, not holding them.‚Äù ‚Äì David Allen (source)

<Label fx:id="dialog" minHeight="-Infinity" style="-fx-background-color: #82008F; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-label-padding: 8; -fx-border-radius: 16; -fx-background-radius: 16;" text="Label" wrapText="true">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" />
